divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my backyard on my trampoline and I saw the alien out of the corner of my eye.I saw it peering over my backyard fence. I knew it was an alien when I saw it. It disappeared when I looked at it straight on. I thought it was weird and it frightened me. It disappeared from sight when I looked at it.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around September 8th 2011
